alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Dickenson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 31 at 9:58AM EDT until November 01 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 expected. * WHERE...In Virginia, Dickenson and Buchanan Counties. In West Virginia, Mingo, Logan, Boone, McDowell and Wyoming Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Hard freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A hard freeze is also expected Wednesday night into Thursday morning.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
